item.title: Kevin Fiala - a full scale breakdown on the newest member of the LA Kings
item.description: Kevin Fiala - a full scale breakdown on the newest member of the LA Kings Date Site External Link 2022-07-04 [[Hockey Royalty]] Kevin Fiala - a full scale breakdown on the newest member of the LA Kings Contributors [[Pavel Maliouguine]] Summary The LA Kings made an early splash into the 2022 NHL off-season with their trade for Minnesota Wild forward Kevin Fiala.

item.title: Three ways the LA Kings can improve the powerplay
item.description: Three ways the LA Kings can improve the powerplay Date Site External Link 2022-11-12 [[Hockey Royalty]] Three ways the LA Kings can improve the powerplay Contributors [[Pavel Maliouguine]] Summary In the 2021-22 NHL season, the most significant discussion point for the LA Kings was the lack of success on the powerplay.
